section: The Term of this Agreement shall be for a period of [* ****] years and [*****] months commencing the 1st day of September 2004 and terminating the [*****] day of [*****].
explanation: The term of the contract is not properly defined. The number of years and the date it ends on is not clear.

section: CONSULTANT hereby gives and grants to ADAMS GOLF the exclusive right and license to use CONSULTANT'S ENDORSEMENT in connection with the manufacture, sale, distribution, advertising and promotion of PRODUCT in the CONTRACT TERRITORY.
explanation: Section 3 states ADAMS GOLF gets the exclusive right to use CONSULTANT'S ENDORSEMENT, but section 4D states CONSULTANT can endorse and play other products and allow other companies to use CONSULTANT'S name, which contradicts section 3.

section: In each and every calendar year of this Agreement, CONSULTANT shall achieve a satisfactory record of play in a minimum of [* ****] professional golf association events on the SPGA and/or PGA tour (which shall include both the PGA and SPGA Tour Skins Games). If for any reason, CONSULTANT should achieve a satisfactory record of play in less than [*****] SPGA and/or PGA tour events in a calendar year, he shall repay ADAMS GOLF an amount per event for each event under [*****] achieved in the given calendar year as follows:
explanation: The minimum number of professional golf association events are not properly defined, due to redaction. It is ambigious.
